net.lightstone.net
Class Session

java.lang.Object
  net.lightstone.net.Session

public final class Session
extends Object

A single connection to the server, which may or may not be associated with a player.

Author:
Graham Edgecombe

Nested Class Summary
static class Session.State
          The state this connection is currently in.

          The channel associated with this session.

private static final int TIMEOUT_TICKS
The number of ticks which are elapsed before a client is disconnected due to a timeout.

Constant Field Values

server

The server this session belongs to.

channel

The channel associated with this session.

messageQueue

private final Queue<Message> messageQueue
A queue of incoming and unprocessed messages.

timeoutCounter

private int timeoutCounter
A timeout counter. This is increment once every tick and if it goes above a certain value the session is disconnected.

state

private Session.State state
The current state.

player

private Player player
The player associated with this session (if there is one).

Sends a message to the client.

Parameters:

disconnect

public void disconnect(String reason)
Disconnects the session with the specified reason. This causes a KickMessage to be sent. When it has been delivered, the channel is closed.

Parameters:
reason - The reason for disconnection.

getServer

public Server getServer()
Gets the server associated with this session.

Returns:
The server.

dispose

Disposes of this session by destroying the associated player, if there is one.
